author: Special Correspondent
text:
The government will only acquire minimum land for implementing the high-speed rail project, Chief Minister Oommen Chandy has said.

Replying to a calling attention motion of Benny Behanan on the need for implementing the project for easing commuters’ woes in the State in the Assembly on Tuesday, Mr. Chandy said the Delhi Metro Rail Corporation was preparing a detailed project report and land acquisition would be initiated on completing the process.
title: Govt. to limit land acquisition for high-speed rail
